title: Schick Owner Edgewell Personal Care Buys Women's Razor Brand Billie; The $310 million deal comes after federal regulators had blocked a deal for Gillette parent Procter & Gamble to acquire the startup
text:
Founded in 2017, Billie targets younger consumers with campaigns that show leg and body hair and promise more affordable products. It has a marketing campaign around the so-called "pink tax," coined from a study that found women's products cost more than similar offerings for men, especially in consumer products.

The deal is expected to be disclosed Monday.

(more to come)

Write to Sharon Terlep at sharon.terlep@wsj.com

Schick Owner Edgewell Personal Care Buys Women's Razor Brand Billie
